title: Thousands protest over Macron's choice of PM
content: Left-wing parties called for protests after Michel Barnier was appointed as prime minister on Thursday.
summary: Left-wing parties called for protests after Michel Barnier was appointed as prime minister on Thursday.

title: World order 'under threat not seen since Cold War'
content: The MI6 and CIA chiefs, who made their first public appearance together, warn of challenges such as the war in Ukraine, Islamic State, Israel-Gaza conflict and the rise of China.
summary: The MI6 and CIA chiefs, who made their first public appearance together, warn of challenges such as the war in Ukraine, Islamic State, Israel-Gaza conflict and the rise of China.

title: Super typhoon Yagi kills four in Vietnam
content: Strong winds and flying debris have caused damage across the north, with 78 injured.

title: Venezuelan forces surround embassy sheltering opposition figures
content: The Argentine embassy is sheltering six political figures opposed to Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro.

title: Woodhall claims Paralympic gold month after wife's Olympic triumph
content: American Hunter Woodhall storms to victory in the T62 400m at the Paralympics in Paris, a month after his wife Tara Davis-Woodhall won Olympic long jump gold.
